text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

translation.en.sahih: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
translation.id.indonesian: Dan apabila mereka melihat orang-orang mukmin, mereka mengatakan: "Sesungguhnya mereka itu benar-benar orang-orang yang sesat",
